summary: This is a cover letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to T-Mobile USA, Inc., accompanying a grand jury subpoena. The letter requests that T-Mobile voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to preserve the confidentiality of an official criminal investigation into a suspected felony.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: He is the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter requesting confidentiality for a grand jury subpoena issued in a criminal investigation.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued to T-Mobile
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York issues a grand jury subpoena to T-Mobile USA, Inc. as part of an official criminal investigation into a suspected felony.

locations: Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
T-Mobile USA, Inc. Law Enforcement Relations, 4 Sylvan Way, Parsippany, NJ 07504
keyFacts: A federal grand jury investigation into a suspected felony was active as of May 2, 2019.
The U.S. Attorney's Office issued a subpoena to T-Mobile USA, Inc. for records.
The government requested T-Mobile to voluntarily keep the subpoena confidential to avoid impeding the investigation.
The document is part of a series of related records (EFTA00151597 through EFTA00151600).
